doseAndPreparation.description: Strategies for safe dosing and substance preparation

practices.name: Start Low, Go Slow Dosing
practices.description: Beginning with low doses especially for first-time users or new substances
practices.rationale: Allows assessment of sensitivity and tolerance before increasing

findings.implication: Very low dose safe for assessment

practices.name: Weight-Based Dosing
practices.description: Calculating doses based on body weight for precision
practices.rationale: Accounts for pharmacokinetic variations with body mass

practices.name: Microdosing Protocol
practices.description: Sub-perceptual dosing to minimize risks while exploring potential benefits
practices.definition: One-tenth to one-twentieth of normal dose

practices.name: Substance Testing and Verification
practices.description: Testing substances to verify composition and identify adulterants
practices.rationale: Prevent accidental ingestion of dangerous substances

methods.description: Small test dose to assess purity and potency

practices.name: Volumetric Dosing for Precision
practices.description: Dissolving known quantity in specific volume of liquid for consistent doses

process: Dissolve known quantity in measured liquid

practices.contraindication: Do not cut LSD blotters - uneven distribution

practices.name: Non-Directive Support Approach

Methods to stay connected to present moment
Letting go and accepting the experience
